main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a luminous body in the sky in Amarillo, Texas on August 4, 1956.
interesting points: The object was reported to be traveling at a high rate of speed., The observation lasted for approximately 14 seconds., Two low-quality photographs were taken, though they do not clearly show the UFO., The report indicated that the witness could not provide further details about the object's characteristics., The case was investigated by the U.S. Air Force with no definitive conclusions.
sighted object: a luminous body in the sky
